sentences.english: The wounded soldier opened his eyes once, but lost consciousness again immediately.

sentences.english: Two of the seriously injured were transferred to a better hospital for treatment of medical conditions.

sentences.english: Many untreated wounds are becoming infected, leading to amputations.

sentences.english: For aeromedical evacuations, it can carry 74 litter patients and two medical attendants.

sentences.english: "I'm glad I wasn't in it. " one of the patients muttered.

sentences.english: The wounded every the moment are taken to clinics dotted ingl around city.

sentences.english: Wherever he went, the wound soldier left behind him a trail of blood.

sentences.english: Mi-4 helicopters were mainly used for intelligence service and evacuation of the wounded.

sentences.english: She shielded the wounded soldier from the strafing of the enemy plane with her own body.
